chart_metadata.description: Zabbix is an enterprise-class open source distributed monitoring solution.
chart_metadata.name: zabbix

groups.name: Container Image
groups.description: Image to be used for container

groups.name: Networking and Services
groups.description: Configure Network and Services for Container

groups.name: Storage and Persistence
groups.description: Persist and Share Data that is Separate from the Container

groups.name: Resources and Devices
groups.description: Specify Resources/Devices to be Allocated to Workload

attrs.description: Number of desired pod replicas
attrs.label: Desired Replicas

questions.label: Extra Args
questions.description: Do not click this unless you know what you are doing

attrs.label: Server Configuration
attrs.description: Info about configuration options in https://www.zabbix.com/documentation/current/en/manual/appendix/config/zabbix_server

attrs.label: ListenBacklog
attrs.description: The maximum number of pending connections in the TCP queue.

attrs.label: DebugLevel
attrs.description: Specifies debug level

attrs.label: LoadModule
attrs.description: Module to load at server startup.

attrs.label: Timeout
attrs.description: Spend no more than Timeout seconds on processing.

attrs.label: ServiceManagerSyncFrequency
attrs.description: Determines how often Zabbix will synchronize configuration of a service manager in seconds.

attrs.label: StartReportWriters
attrs.description: Number of pre-forked instances of report writers.

attrs.label: StartPollers
attrs.description: Number of pre-forked instances of pollers.

attrs.label: StartPreprocessors
attrs.description: Number of pre-forked instances of IPMI pollers.

attrs.label: StartPreprocessors
attrs.description: Number of pre-forked instances of preprocessing workers.

attrs.label: StartPollersUnreachable
attrs.description: Number of pre-forked instances of pollers for unreachable hosts (including IPMI and Java).

attrs.label: StartTrappers
attrs.description: Number of pre-forked instances of trappers.

attrs.label: StartPingers
attrs.description: Number of pre-forked instances of ICMP pingers.

attrs.label: StartDiscoverers
attrs.description: Number of pre-forked instances of discoverers.

attrs.label: StartHistoryPollers
attrs.description: Number of pre-forked instances of history pollers.

attrs.label: StartHTTPPollers
attrs.description: Number of pre-forked instances of HTTP pollers.

attrs.label: StartODBCPollers
attrs.description: Number of pre-forked instances of ODBC pollers.

attrs.label: StartTimers
attrs.description: Number of pre-forked instances of timers.

attrs.label: StartEscalators
attrs.description: Number of pre-forked instances of escalators.

attrs.label: StartAlerters
attrs.description: Number of pre-forked instances of alerters.

attrs.label: StartJavaPollers
attrs.description: Number of pre-forked instances of Java pollers.

attrs.label: StartDBSyncers
attrs.description: Number of pre-forked instances of history syncers.

attrs.label: StartProxyPollers
attrs.description: Number of pre-forked instances of pollers for passive proxies1.

attrs.label: StartLLDProcessors
attrs.description: Number of pre-forked instances of low-level discovery (LLD) workers.

attrs.label: StartVMwareCollectors
attrs.description: Number of pre-forked VMware collector instances.

attrs.label: VMwareFrequency
attrs.description: Delay in seconds between data gathering from a single VMware service.

attrs.label: VMwarePerfFrequency
attrs.description: Delay in seconds between performance counter statistics retrieval from a single VMware service.

attrs.label: VMwareCacheSize
attrs.description: Shared memory size for storing VMware data.

attrs.label: VMwareTimeout
attrs.description: The maximum number of seconds vmware collector will wait for a response from VMware service (vCenter or ESX hypervisor).

attrs.label: HousekeepingFrequency
attrs.description: Determines how often Zabbix will perform housekeeping procedure in hours.

attrs.label: MaxHousekeeperDelete
attrs.description: No more than 'MaxHousekeeperDelete' rows (corresponding to [tablename], [field], [value]) will be deleted per one task in one housekeeping cycle.

attrs.label: ProblemHousekeepingFrequency
attrs.description: Determines how often Zabbix will delete problems for deleted triggers in seconds.

attrs.label: CacheSize
attrs.description: Size of configuration cache, in bytes.

attrs.label: CacheUpdateFrequency
attrs.description: Determines how often Zabbix will perform update of configuration cache in seconds.

attrs.label: HistoryCacheSize
attrs.description: Size of history cache, in bytes.

attrs.label: HistoryIndexCacheSize
attrs.description: Size of history index cache, in bytes.

attrs.label: HistoryStorageDateIndex
attrs.description: Enable preprocessing of history values in history storage to store values in different indices based on date

attrs.label: TrendCacheSize
attrs.description: Size of trend cache, in bytes.

attrs.label: TrendFunctionCacheSize
attrs.description: Size of trend function cache, in bytes.

attrs.label: ValueCacheSize
attrs.description: Size of history value cache, in bytes.

attrs.label: TrapperTimeout
attrs.description: Specifies how many seconds trapper may spend processing new data.

attrs.label: UnreachablePeriod
attrs.description: Determines after how many seconds of unreachability treats a host as unavailable.

attrs.label: UnreachableDelay
attrs.description: Determines how often host is checked for availability during the unreachability period in seconds.

attrs.label: UnavailableDelay
attrs.description: Determines how often host is checked for availability during the unavailability period in seconds.

attrs.label: LogSlowQueries
attrs.description: Determines how long a database query may take before being logged in milliseconds.

attrs.label: ProxyConfigFrequency
attrs.description: Determines how often Zabbix server sends configuration data to a Zabbix proxy in seconds. Used only for proxies in a passive mode.

attrs.label: ProxyDataFrequency
attrs.description: Determines how often Zabbix server requests history data from a Zabbix proxy in seconds. Used only for proxies in a passive mode.

attrs.label: ExportFileSize
attrs.description: Maximum size per export file in bytes. Only used for rotation if ExportDir is set.

attrs.label: ExportType
attrs.description: Entity types (events, history, trends) for real-time export (all types by default).

attrs.label: StatsAllowedIP
attrs.description: IP addresses, optionally in CIDR notation, or DNS names of external Zabbix instances. Stats request will be accepted only from the addresses listed here.

attrs.label: Frontend Configuration
attrs.description: Info about configuration options in https://hub.docker.com/r/zabbix/zabbix-web-nginx-pgsql

attrs.label: WebAccessLogs
attrs.description: Sets the Access Log directive for Web-server.

attrs.label: MaxExecutionTime
attrs.description: The variable is PHP max_execution_time option

attrs.label: MemoryLimit
attrs.description: The variable is PHP memory_limit option.

attrs.label: PostMaxSize
attrs.description: The variable is PHP post_max_size option.

attrs.label: UploadMaxFileSize
attrs.description: The variable is PHP upload_max_filesize option.

attrs.label: MaxInputTime
attrs.description: The variable is PHP max_input_time  option.

attrs.label: SessionName
attrs.description: Used as the name of the Zabbix frontend session cookie.

attrs.label: DenyGUIAccess
attrs.description: Enable maintenance mode for Zabbix web-interface.

subquestions.label: WarningMessage
subquestions.description: Information message about maintenance period for Zabbix web-interface.

subquestions.label: AccessIPRange
subquestions.description: IP addresses which are allowed for accessing to Zabbix web-interface during maintenance period.

attrs.label: SSOSettings
attrs.description: The variable allows to specify custom SSO settings in JSON format.

attrs.label: PHP FPM PM Min Spare Servers
PHP FPM PM Max Spare Servers
Agent Configuration
attrs.description: Info about configuration options in https://www.zabbix.com/documentation/current/en/manual/appendix/config/zabbix_agent2

subquestions.label: Hostname
subquestions.description: Required for active checks and must match hostnames as configured on the server.

subquestions.label: HostnameItem
subquestions.description: Item used for generating Hostname if it is not defined. Ignored if Hostname is defined.

subquestions.label: HostMetadata
subquestions.description: Optional parameter that defines host metadata.

subquestions.label: HostMetadataItem
subquestions.description: Optional parameter that defines an item used for getting host metadata.

subquestions.label: Timeout
subquestions.description: Spend no more than Timeout seconds on processing.

subquestions.label: EnablePersistentBuffer
subquestions.description: Enable usage of local persistent storage for active items.

subquestions.label: PersistentBufferPeriod
subquestions.description: The time period for which data should be stored, when there is no connection to the server or proxy. Older data will be lost. Log data will be preserved.

subquestions.label: RefreshActiveChecks
subquestions.description: How often the list of active checks is refreshed, in seconds.

subquestions.label: BufferSend
subquestions.description: The time interval in seconds which determines how often values are sent from the buffer to Zabbix server.

subquestions.label: BufferSize
subquestions.description: Maximum number of values in a memory buffer. The agent will send all collected data to Zabbix server or proxy if the buffer is full.

subquestions.label: UnsafeUserParameters
subquestions.description: Allow all characters to be passed in arguments to user-defined parameters.

subquestions.label: TLSConnect
subquestions.description: How the agent should connect to Zabbix server or proxy. Used for active checks.

subquestions.label: TLSAccept
subquestions.description: What incoming connections to accept. Used for a passive checks. Multiple values can be specified.

subquestions.label: TLSPSKIdentity
subquestions.description: Pre-shared key identity string, used for encrypted communications with Zabbix server.

subquestions.label: TLSPSKFile
subquestions.description: Full pathname of a file containing the agent pre-shared key used for encrypted communications with Zabbix components.

subquestions.label: AllowKey
subquestions.description: Allow execution of those item keys that match a pattern. Key pattern is a wildcard expression that supports "*" character to match any number of any characters

subquestions.label: DenyKey
subquestions.description: Deny execution of those item keys that match a pattern. Key pattern is a wildcard expression that supports "*" character to match any number of any characters.

attrs.label: Java Gateway Configuration
attrs.description: Info about configuration options in https://www.zabbix.com/documentation/current/en/manual/appendix/config/zabbix_java

subquestions.label: Start Pollers
subquestions.description: Number of worker threads to start.

subquestions.label: Timeout
subquestions.description: Spend no more than Timeout seconds on processing.

subquestions.label: DebugLevel
subquestions.description: Specifies debug level

attrs.label: WebService Configuration
attrs.description: Info about configuration options in https://www.zabbix.com/documentation/current/en/manual/appendix/config/zabbix_web_service

subquestions.label: DebugLevel
subquestions.description: Specifies debug level

subquestions.label: Timeout
subquestions.description: Spend no more than Timeout seconds on processing.

questions.label: Please read the documentation at https://truecharts.org
Please consider supporting TrueCharts, see https://truecharts.org/sponsor

4.0.28.app_readme:
Zabbix is an enterprise-class open source distributed monitoring solution.

This App is supplied by TrueCharts, for more information visit the manual: https://truecharts.org/charts/incubator/zabbix

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!
4.0.28.detailed_readme:
README

General Info

TrueCharts can be installed as both normal Helm Charts or as Apps on TrueNAS SCALE. However only installations using the TrueNAS SCALE Apps system are supported.

For more information about this App, please check the docs on the TrueCharts website

This chart is not maintained by the upstream project and any issues with the chart should be raised here

Support

  • Please check our quick-start guides for TrueNAS SCALE.
  • See the Website
  • Check our Discord
  • Open a issue

Sponsor TrueCharts

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!

All Rights Reserved - The TrueCharts Project
